title: Mushroom and chicken liver pâté
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '450g (1 lb) chicken livers, trimmed and chopped', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 (200g) punnet mushrooms, chopped', '3 rashers bacon, chopped', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 large bay leaf', '1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary', '2 large egg yolks', '3 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', '2 tablespoons double cream', '2 tablespoons sherry', '1 dessertspoon flour', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
